quotes.statement: The best investment you can make is an investment in yourself. The more you learn, the more you'll earn.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.statement: Be fearful when others are greedy and be greed when others are fearful.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.statement: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.statement: Never invest in a business you cannot understand.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.statement: The key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.statement: The basic story remains simple and never ending. Stock aren't lottery tickets. There's a company attached to every share.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.statement: Know what you own and know why you own it.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.statement: The big money is not in the buying or selling, but in the waiting.
quotes.name: Charlie Munger

quotes.statement: Simplicity has a way of improving performance by enabling us to better understand what we are doing.
quotes.name: Charlie Munger

quotes.statement: Spend each day trying to be a little wise than you were when you wake up.
quotes.name: Charlie Munger
